name: pertualangan si udin
description: Hello everyone, this time I'm making an adventure-themed game, telling a story of an unemployed Zero who enters Isekai, to get out of Isekai, Udin has to fight all the monsters in Isekai's world, an epic battle, let's try it now. oh yes, I hope there is a donation from friends for this game, because I want to buy a google play console account
